summary: An Ordinance rejecting the award of the jury in the East Newton Street condemnation proceeding under Ordinance No. 24088, repealing Ordinance No. 24088, providing for the laying off, opening, widening, extending and establishing of East Newton Street from Thirteenth Avenue North to Fifteenth Avenue North, providing for the condemnation, appropriation, taking and damaging of land and other property necessary therefor, and providing that the payment for such improvement be made by special assessment upon property specially benefited in the manner provided by law, passed April 11, 1910; reconsidered and again passed by the City Council, notwithstanding the veto of the Mayor thereto, on the 9th day of May, 1910, and authorizing the dismissal of the action in the Superior Court, based upon said ordinance and payment of all taxable costs.
